heading: Multi-Campus Registration Notice
body: Registration services are now available at all MSU campuses (Gweru, Zvishavane, and Harare). Students can register at their nearest center regardless of their primary campus.

heading: MSU Cultural Week
body: Join us for the 2025 Cultural Week celebration from May 4th to May 10th. Activities include traditional dance, food fairs, and the Miss MSU pageant.
